title: I Was in a game and it remakes with no one afk?
body:
Hey Guys,
Recently i was in a game and i came late at 2.00 minutes i walked to lane after my internet being stupid i had about 1 minute in lane then the remake vote started, even tho i was in lane at 3 minutes farming then the game ends from my after we surrender and i get 20 minute priory q. Im quite disgusted from riot even letting this happen any ways to fix this I'm pretty pissed off as i was not even afk and we surrendered please could i have some support from a rioter thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

The system automatically flags you as AFK if you disconnect or leave a game for any reason for more than X period of time.
Any ways to resolve? I played 3 of them and now its reset back to 4 I'm not sure whats happening and I'm getting triggered ;(
